text:
through our subliminal night; e.g.,cracking the Easter
Island script by the simple device of singing it instead
of looking at it, fusing functions in our all-at-once
world instead of separating them.
The written form creates only the Parkinson Law irrelevancies
today, forcing more and more segmentation.
Bruce Attridge and Go. are going to work on a batch of
taped commentaries and queries to accompany kines and
radio tapes.
Cordially
